bridge.description: Name of bridge or fake bridge to manage

fail_mode.description: Set bridge fail-mode. The default value (None) is a No-op.

parent.description: Bridge parent of the fake bridge to manage

vlan.description: The VLAN id of the fake bridge to manage (must be between 0 and 4095). This parameter is required if I(parent) parameter is set.

set.description: Run set command after bridge configuration. This parameter is non-idempotent, play will always return I(changed) state if present

timeout.description: How long to wait for ovs-vswitchd to respond

external_ids.description: A dictionary of external-ids. Omitting this parameter is a No-op. To  clear all external-ids pass an empty value.
